content: designed for 18-inch dolls this dress is worked seamlessly from top to bottom beginning at the neckline the yoke is shaped with yarn-over increases creating a rounded fit the dress is worked back and forth to the hip line then continues in the round to form the skirt garter stitch button bands add classic detail while the hem and sleeve edges are finished with a simple crochet trim knit from sparkling yarn this dress is perfect for holiday celebrations
